description: Activates N8N deep research pipeline, returns INSPIRATION_<timestamp>.md at CWD. ZOO Criteria: Successful return of structured no-op instructions.
comment: Initial version - triggers external n8n workflow for deep research and restructuring. ZOO certified based on outcome.
chain_template: VOID execute HTTP POST to n8n_deep_research_webhook with {user_query} THEN VOID write response.content to CWD/INSPIRATION_{response.timestamp}.md

step_definitions.operation: Send user query to n8n deep research pipeline webhook
step_definitions.void_warning: External HTTP call introduces indeterminacy - response depends on Gemini API state

step_definitions.operation: Write timestamped inspiration file to CWD
